ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T16:33:52 [Issue ID 4000-40708] urn:comicvine:4000-40708 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 23:25:38. [Issue ID 56880]
ComicInfo.Summary: Pitt is deep within an Arctic base trying to save the captured Timmy from the Creed aliens who have kidnapped him when Wroth, his brother, shows up to oppose him. As Pitt and Wroth battle, Holdsworth begins the process which will allow Zoyvod to manifest in the body of Jack Smithers and eradicate the presence of the benevolent alien, Jereb, from Timmy's body. The plan fails and Zoyvod is destroyed, blasting Pitt into space in the process. Jereb, now separated from Timmy, appears to Pitt and promises to tell him the truth about his origins.
ComicInfo.Title: [Untitled]
